rows.label: qev030902_MSG0001
rows.name:
All who live will one day die. We do not mourn.
We return my father where he belongs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0002
rows.name:
Ah, [ST:playername ]. My father is gone.
Auld Belgazus is dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_JNK0010
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev030902_SEL0011
rows.name: Offer condolences to Galba.

rows.label: qev030902_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev030902_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Galba for details about Bazis's request.

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0003
rows.name:
It is good. My father has found peace.
There is no sadness in this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0004
rows.name: ...What? Bazis asked you for help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0005
rows.name: Yes. He has Hexuna to worry for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0006
rows.name:
Then go to Oblivia. Near Kintrees. Start by hunting
all dune adseculas there. Will you do this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0007
rows.name:
My father was heart of clan. Also fist.
He deserves to be flesh of great beast.
Let us find one after we clear away such weak vermin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev030902_SEL0031
rows.name: Pat Galba's shoulder and tell him to leave it to you.

rows.label: qev030902_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev030902_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask Galba about the Prone custom
of feeding the dead to beasts.

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0008
rows.name:
You are good friend. You beat me in combat.
You will have no trouble with dune adseculas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0009
rows.name: Prone live together with beasts. From cradle to grave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0010
rows.name:
Once you kill all dune adseculas, funeral can begin.
You will understand as you watch it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0011
rows.name:
I leave it to you. Clear area by killing at least three
dune adseculas. Then I will bring my father's body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0012
rows.name:
We will send Auld Belgazus off in Oblivia.
At Kintrees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030902_MSG0013
rows.name:
No dune adseculas will touch my father.
Leave no such vermin alive.[ST:wait ]
